head.title: Let's Play Two! In Two Stadiums!

hedline.hl1: Let's Play Two! In Two Stadiums!

abstract.p: Charles Goldman letter hails the split-park double header between New York Mets and New York Yankees (July 7 article)

block.p: Re ''Take Me Out to the Ballgames (by Subway, Car or Canoe)'' (news article, July 7):

With a split-park doubleheader, an event that hasn't happened in nearly a century, a special opportunity for New York City fans and Major League Baseball has surfaced. With two inter-league games between the Mets and the Yankees in two different stadiums on the same day, capacity crowds can be expected.
Re ''Take Me Out to the Ballgames (by Subway, Car or Canoe)'' (news article, July 7):

With a split-park doubleheader, an event that hasn't happened in nearly a century, a special opportunity for New York City fans and Major League Baseball has surfaced. With two inter-league games between the Mets and the Yankees in two different stadiums on the same day, capacity crowds can be expected.

Revenues can be further increased by avoiding the pitfall of the ''two for one'' game dreaded by the franchises. The day of baseball that we'll see on Saturday in New York should become a yearly '' win-win'' event.
